# emaxnls

<!-- badges: start -->
[![R-CMD-check](https://github.com/djnavarro/emaxnls/actions/workflows/R-CMD-check.yaml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/djnavarro/emaxnls/actions/workflows/R-CMD-check.yaml)
<!-- badges: end -->

The **emaxnls** package provides tools for nonlinear least squares estimation for Emax regression models.

## Installation

You can install the development version of emaxnls from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("djnavarro/emaxnls")
```

## Example

```{r}
library(emaxnls)
emax_nls(
  structural_model = response_1 ~ exposure_1, 
  covariate_model = list(E0 ~ cnt_a, Emax ~ 1, logEC50 ~ 1), 
  data = emax_df
)
```
